name: Chantwrithe
description: Veiled in spores and draped in hymn-tissue, the Chantwrithe weaves fungal song through the landscape. Their chants are not heard â€” they are felt in the lungs, the marrow, and the soil beneath one's feet.
abilities: Spore-Bound: This model can re-roll one failed attack roll per activation.
Fungal Regeneration: At the start of this model's activation, if it has suffered any wounds, roll a D6. On a 4+, heal 1 wound.
